Sales / Business Development
Location

10/District 3/District 1
Phone number
: 0908169940
Email
: haaidaang@gmail.com
 OBJECTIVES
My name's Dang. I am 27 years old. I am energetic,
active and ambitous person. 
With 4 years experiences in Sales field, E-commerce,
E-commerce and Customer Service and working in
some start-up environemt. I am confident to be a
candidate that suitable for your position.
1st - 2nd year: I want to have chances to develop
my knowledge, abilities, skills to help company
increase sales, profit, brand and develop the new
customer system.
2nd - 5th year: I want to be promoted to the higher
positon (Regional SM or Sale Director), increase the
income and build up my team that will help the
company extend the market.
Address
: Số 54 đường 332, Phường 5,
District 8, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam
 SKILLS
Vision
Team - Work
Presentation
Communication
Leading
 LANGUAGES
English
 EXPERIENCE
Year(s) of Experience: 4
Current Level: Manager
9/2018 - Now : Sale Manager - GIDO - Digital Forwarding Platform - Scommerce
Group
- Created campaign boost sale. Increase 50% revenue, month by month from Oct 2018 to Jan 2019. 
- Co-operate with marketing team to understand customers and create sale campaigns 
- Understanding logistic system, operation system, analyst customer Data. 
- Monitor and report on effectiveness of sale team to CEO 
- Research and analyst competitors, co-operate with tech and operation team to develop GIDO 
product 
- Analyst potential strategic partner relationships for company marketing. 
Achievement 
- Build up team from 0 to 5 members in 6 months 
- Break the company target for 3 consecutive months 
- Complete some document about sop, training and KPI for sale team See less
8/2016 - 7/2018 : Telesale Leader - SUNO.VN - POS software
- Building up people, creating KPI for telesale team 
- Assigned, followed and reviewed the task for team members 
- Create script for cold call and planning the strategy for team. 
- Motivate and maintain the morale team members. 
- Build up the work plan to achieve the company target
12/2015 - 8/2016 : Sales Leader - POS Software - SUNO.VN
After 3 months, I become a Sales Leader. My mission is building one team for business department 
- Build up the recruitment plan, training and coaching for newbie 
- Creating KPI for our team, report KPI's members to manager 
- Planning the business strategy for my team. 
- Motivate and maintain the morale team members
6/2014 - 10/2014 : Internship at SEO position - G-OFFICE COMPANY
- SEO the website of this company to the top of Google. 
- Writting the content to advertise the company. 
- Search and find the websites, forums and post the advertised content
1/2012 - 6/2012 : Sale Excutive - HOME FLOWERS FURNITURE COMPANY
Understand about the company products and give the advice to the customers. More over, receive
the belief from director, I was sent to the back office to manage and control the financial of the
company
Completion date 4-2016

Enhance management capacity for middle management certificate

Computer Engineering

devices in our houses
